title: Vulpea v0.3
description: Announcing Vulpea v0.3, with major performance improvements for note querying operations. The release introduces a materialised view table that provides a 4.5x speed boost for general queries, plus specialised query functions that can be up to 150x faster in certain scenarios. Whilst write operations take a small hit, the trade-off is worth it for large note collections. I've also added several quality-of-life improvements like better metadata handling and new tag utility functions.
